attributes.action: bring back the community post offices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: bring back the community post offices - we lost ours, we now have a mobile svs just 3 times a week, oaps queuing for their pensions have to wait in the rain outside the van, the van is unreliable in bad weather, the local shop is suffering - the post office provided a great service and a place to meet - now its a pain to have to visit the van
